services_hero.title: Future-Ready Digital Experiences
services_hero.whoWeAre: We are a digital experience agency based in Istanbul.
services_hero.paragraph: We craft powerful and refined digital solutions that elevate brands, strengthen online presence, and create seamless user experiences. Our focus spans creative strategy, visual identity, UX/UI design, and end-to-end web development to help businesses move with confidence in a fast-changing digital world.

section1.title: Human-Centered Approach
section1.subtitle: We start every project by deeply understanding the people who will use your product.

section2.title: Precision in Craft
section2.subtitle: Design, development, and strategy come together with meticulous attention to detail.

section3.title: Results That Matter
section3.subtitle: We don’t just create beautiful products—we build experiences that move metrics.

section4.title: Innovation & Technology
section4.subtitle: We leverage cutting-edge technology to create forward-thinking, scalable solutions.

hero.slogan1: The finesse of the web, the elegance of design.
hero.paragraph: We connect brands and their audience through strategy, research, modern technology, and purposeful design.

cta.subtitle: Whether you have a clear idea or are undecided — we can reach the right solution together.

consult.title: Which Package Suits Me?
consult.description: Not sure? No worries! We'll guide you quickly to the best option.

offer.title: I Want a Quote Directly
offer.description: Have your project ready? Send the details and get a personalized offer.

faq.question: Which package suits me?
faq.answer: Don't worry if you're undecided! We can analyze your needs and determine the best package together.

faq.question: How does the revision process work?
faq.answer: All our packages include revision rights. Details may vary depending on the package, and we plan every step together.

faq.question: What is the delivery time?
faq.answer: It depends on the scope of your project. Average delivery time is 2-6 weeks; you can find detailed information in the package descriptions.

faq.question: How is payment made?
faq.answer: Payments are made securely via bank transfer or online payment methods. We share the details after you receive the quote.

faq.question: How does the process proceed?
faq.answer: First, we clarify your needs, then you select the package and quote. After approval, the project begins and we proceed step by step.

contact.heading: Good things happn when you say hey.
contact.info: Fill out the form to get information about our packages and pricing. Just let us know your needs and budget.

section1.title: Mission and Vision: A Digital Experience Agency Rising from Istanbul
section1.main_text: At Ozzenc, we are a dynamic Digital Experience Agency and technology studio based in Istanbul. We transcend the traditional agency boundaries, creating powerful and refined digital solutions that elevate brands, strengthen online presence, and create seamless user experiences.
section1.mission: Our mission is to connect brands and their audience through strategy, research, modern technology, and purposeful design.
section1.vision: Our vision is to provide future-ready digital experiences, enabling businesses to move with confidence in a fast-changing digital world.

section2.title: Value Proposition and Difference: Precision in Craft and Results That Matter
section2.intro: Our focus is not just on creating beautiful products, but on building experiences that move metrics and are scalable in the long term. Our four core values, which set us apart from our competitors, form the foundation of every service we offer:

value1.title: Human-Centered Approach
value1.description: We start every project by deeply understanding the people who will use the product. We gain clear and actionable insights based on user goals, pain points, and real behaviors.

value2.title: Precision in Craft
value2.description: Design, development, and strategy come together with meticulous attention to structure, flow, and UI consistency. UX clarity and technical quality are always prioritized in our products.

value3.title: Innovation & Technology
value3.description: We leverage advanced technologies such as modern frameworks, AI, and automation to create future-proof, scalable solutions, working on future-ready architecture.

value4.title: Results That Matter
value4.description: Metrics are everything to us. Our focus is always on delivering higher conversions, better engagement, faster load times, and long-term scalability.

section3.title: Team and Culture: Comprehensive Expertise, Single Goal
section3.main_text: The Ozzenc team consists of professionals specializing in their respective fields, offering full-service solutions. We are a team that builds digital networks with precision.
section3.expertise_intro: Our comprehensive services and areas of expertise:
expertise: End-to-End Development: We offer all types of Web Development solutions you need, from corporate websites and e-commerce sites to custom software (CRM, SaaS).
UI/UX and Design Systems: Our meticulous approach to Web and Mobile UI/UX design, UX research, and Design System (component library) creation combines usability and brand identity.

Strategic Partnership: With our Consulting and Strategy services (MVP planning, market analysis, and technology selection consulting), we aim to be more than just a service provider—we aim to be a strategic partner in your digital transformation.
section3.culture_philosophy: Our culture is built upon the philosophy of Design. Develop. Deliver. With an agile, transparent, and results-oriented approach, we consider your success our own.

section4.title: Call to Action: Ready to Grow Together.
section4.intro: We are ready to take on our role in your success story. Whether you come with a clear idea or are undecided — we can reach the right solution together.
section4.outro: Let's analyze your needs and determine the most suitable option among our Packages to start your digital journey.

hero.tagline: We design and develop digital experiences that drive businesses forward, strengthen the brand, and deliver measurable results.

caseStudies.title: Our Success Stories
caseStudies.subtitle: Discover the value we add to our clients through our creative solutions and strategic partnerships.

philosophy.title: Our Production Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Our simple and transparent three-step process that guarantees the success of every project.

step1.title: Discover & Understand
step1.detail: We deeply analyze your needs, goals, and users. We establish the core strategy that defines success.

step2.title: Design & Develop
step2.detail: We code user experience (UX) focused designs with pixel perfection, utilizing the latest technologies. We proceed with agility and transparency.

step3.title: Launch & Grow
step3.detail: We launch your project live. We monitor performance, gather feedback, and continuously improve your digital presence.

expertise.title: Our Expertise Areas
expertise.subtitle: The cornerstones of the solutions we offer to make your brand stand out in the digital world.

area1.name: UX/UI Design
area1.description: From user experience (UX) research to aesthetic and functional interface (UI) design, we craft your brand's digital identity.

area2.name: Web Development
area2.description: We develop fast, scalable, and SEO-friendly end-to-end web solutions using modern technologies like React and Next.js.

area3.name: Strategic Consulting
area3.description: We ensure your investment receives the best return through services like MVP planning, technology selection, and digital strategy creation.
